name: Spire
win: Win a round by eliminating the other team. First to win 5 rounds wins the match.
description: Build up to the floating green weapons and press C to grab it.

name: Static
win: Win a round by eliminating the other team. First to win 5 rounds wins the match.
description: All players start with a randomized loadout. Eliminate the other team with what you've got!
